Articles.Content:
If you've been following our epic Jool mission (perhaps in [this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121490)), you know that we have a ton of orbital assembly going on. One of the things we need to do is keep two huge ships - several hundred tons each - right next to each other so we can transfer small mission craft between the two. Instead of doing something sane, we decided to attach them with harpoons ... and it worked!

**This video has tighter, more interesting editing (and is shorter), so it should be even more fun to watch.**

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/A1Okmjdb0gs?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

You can visit our channel [here](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmAVWm58KaBuFdRa04KauXw). If you like it we'd appreciate a subscribe. Thanks!
